title: Binary Analysis Tool (BAT) no longer maintained - alternatives? [closed]
content:
Closed. This question is opinion-based. It is not currently accepting answers.
                                
                            











Want to improve this question? Update the question so it can be answered with facts and citations by editing this post.


Closed 6 years ago.







                        Improve this question
                    



I read on the BAT github page that BAT is no longer actively maintained.

Why did the project come to an end?
What alternatives are there to unpack all kinds of archives /
firmwares / binary structures?
Or do you plan to still use BAT nevertheless?
